content: cuddly cowl by jude roust materials james brett marble 100% acrylic 341yds/312m per 200g ball 1 x 200g ball or any suitable chunky yarn 6mm uk4 usj/10 crochet hook measurements 16in 40cm high 32in 80cm circumference gauge 12 sts x 8 row to 10cm measured over half treble on 6mm crochet hook notes cowl is worked in half treble throughout the us term is half_double_crochet half_double_crochet method using 6mm crochet hook and marble chunky make 95 chain join to form ring taking care not to twist work round 1 work 1 half_double_crochet into each chain to end of round round 2 work 1 half_double_crochet into back loop only of half_double_crochet of previous round next continue in continuous rounds working into back loops only until cowl is desired depth © 2013 jude roust
